name: Buried Darkness (Early Access)
description:
Buried Darkness is a short first-person indie horror game created by a solo developer in 6 weeks. The game's main goal is to build an atmospheric horror with well-chosen audio and graphical style. This is not a  survival or a thriller game where you have to run or killing enemies. This is more like a psychological horror game.

     The game contains jump-scares. If you have heart disease, please avoid playing this game! Story/Gameplay

The game takes place in an apartment you just moved into it. But there is something wrong with this place. You start hearing strange noises and rattlings. You have to do something to get rid of this darkness. The way out seems simple. But something wants to keep you in this place.

In this game, you don't need to read many notes. Or finding the keys to unlock doors. The game's mechanics designed to be fluent gameplay.

Features
  • Quality Graphics
  • Fluent Gameplay
  • Developed with Unreal Engine
  • Quality Audio
  • Well-optimized for low-end systems too

If you encounter bugs or have an idea to be added to the game feel free to contact me at allyigames@gmail.com

Note: The full version of the game will be released very soon.

The game is free but if you wish to support me via itch.io, That will help me to complete this project.

If you enjoyed the game, please rate it and leave a review. All suggestions are welcomed. P.S: For the best experience wearing headphones is recommended.
